api_list.name: showAllVehicleColors
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aaoo-chale-ridesharing-api.p.rapidapi.com/colors"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aaoo-chale-ridesharing-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: accountSetup
api_list.description: After register and verify OTP user setup the account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aaoo-chale-ridesharing-api.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aaoo-chale-ridesharing-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.patch(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
